Package com.fssa.inifiniti.dao

Class BookingDAO

java.lang.Object
com.fssa.inifiniti.dao.BookingDAO
public class BookingDAO extends Object
This class provides data access methods related to bookings.

      Parameters:

      Returns:
      True if the booking was successfully created, false otherwise.

      public com.fssa.inifiniti.model.Booking findUserForEditSeatNum(int shuttleId, String email, int seatNum) throws com.fssa.inifiniti.dao.exceptions.DaoException
      Retrieves booking information for a specific user with a given shuttle ID, email, and seat number.
      Parameters:
      shuttleId - The ID of the shuttle.
      email - The email address of the user.
      seatNum - The seat number to search for.
      Returns:

      Throws:
      com.fssa.inifiniti.dao.exceptions.DaoException - If an error occurs during database interaction.

    • editBooking

      public boolean editBooking(com.fssa.inifiniti.model.Booking booking) throws com.fssa.inifiniti.dao.exceptions.DaoException
      Updates the seat number of a booking for a specific user with matching username, email, destination, and shuttle ID.
      Parameters:
      booking - The Booking object containing the updated seat number and identification information.
      Returns:
      True if the booking was successfully updated, false otherwise.
      Throws:
      com.fssa.inifiniti.dao.exceptions.DaoException - If an error occurs during database interaction.

    • editBookingByBookingId

      public boolean editBookingByBookingId(int seatNum, String destination, int bookingId) throws com.fssa.inifiniti.dao.exceptions.DaoException
      Updates the seat number and destination of a booking by its booking ID.
      Parameters:
      seatNum - The new seat number for the booking.
      destination - The new destination for the booking.
      bookingId - The unique ID of the booking to be updated.
      Returns:
      True if the booking was successfully updated, false otherwise.
      Throws:
      com.fssa.inifiniti.dao.exceptions.DaoException - If an error occurs during database interaction.

    • deleteBooking

      public boolean deleteBooking(int shuttleId, String email) throws com.fssa.inifiniti.dao.exceptions.DaoException
      Deletes a booking with a specific email address and shuttle ID.
      Parameters:
      shuttleId - The ID of the shuttle associated with the booking to be deleted.
      email - The email address of the user associated with the booking to be deleted.
      Returns:
      True if the booking was successfully deleted, false otherwise.
      Throws:
      com.fssa.inifiniti.dao.exceptions.DaoException - If an error occurs during database interaction.
